summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5852 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, J. B. Johnson Company's 1st Addition, being the alley between Beacon Avenue and Alamo Place, from Spokane Street to Hinds Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 77167, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
